message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of the product to me is quite high. Could you do $90?

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $87.50 for the product. That's my final offer, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to meet me at that price.
